title: Loose Chronicles: Dog from a Distant Universe
description: Ocean Beach, California 1975. Welcome to the fascinating world of Loose, Sundance, and a small gathering of humans . . . Sundance—“King of the Wild Animals”—the beautiful Golden Lab ever on the prowl for seagulls, cheesecake, and fleas . . . Loose—the straggly Labradoodle with a dog-busy brain—strangely different from the average pup. In fact, Bob often kids that Loose just might be from another galaxy, sent to Earth to sniff around before the big space invasion. Naturally, Loose believes the story. After all, he’s a profoundly observant dog with plenty to say . . . even if nobody seems to be listening. From overzealous dogcatchers to strawberry-scented flea baths, Loose Dog from a Distant Universe (Hidden Shelf Publishing House) is packed with bone-gnawing adventure. And, it’s a true story . . . sort of . . .
author: Robert D.  Gaines
